attributes.action: Have no more homework except from revision
attributes.additional_details: Because it’s is a struggle if mental health and many people struggle

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, that call for similar action:

Abolish all homework:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643846

Ban homework except for GCSE coursework:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/637387

Ban primary schools from setting homework:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636943
